name: 1Dictionary
description: 1Dictionary helps you access all your favourite dictionaries easily via Ulauncher.

preferences.name: Matching method
preferences.description: Matching method. Choose 'regex' if you feel 'fuzzy' is too slow

preferences.name: Active vocabulary
preferences.description: Active vocabularies: comma-delimted text. Supported vocabularies: deutsch, english, espanol, francais, italiano, nederlands, norsk

preferences.name: German Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for German. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: English Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for English. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: Spanish Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for Spanish. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: French Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for French. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: Italian Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for Italian. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: Dutch Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for Dutch. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: Norwegian Dictionary
preferences.description: Online dictionary for Norwegian. Use %s as a placeholder for a query in a URL

preferences.name: Other online dictionary service
preferences.description: Query for the online dictionary in the format of 'vocabulary0, query_url0; vocabulary 1, query_url1'. Please refer to https://github.com/JihongJu/ulauncher-1dictionary#configure-online-dictionary-services for more information
